title: Preparation of Zn3Nb2O8 anode material for high-performance lithium/sodium-ion batteries
content:
RSC Adv., 2024, 14,25571-25578
DOI: 10.1039/D4RA03616F, Paper
Open Access
Â  This article is licensed under a Creative Commons Attribution-NonCommercial 3.0 Unported Licence.
Xuemin Yin, Shuling Cheng, Yuyang Zhang, Chencheng Liu
A novel Zn3Nb2O8 with stump-like structure was prepared for the first time as anode materials for lithium/sodium-ion batteries. The Zn3Nb2O8-B anode materials present excellent long-life performance.
